Package utility

package utility
  • Class
    Description
    Checker
    Allows implementations to validate the fields of a Vehicle class.
    CheckingResult
    Acts as a returned value for classes that implement the Checker interface.
    Correction
    Classes that implement this interface do value correction before checking.
    FileHandler
    Operates on all project files.
    IdentifierHandler
    Performs identifiers validation or generation.
    JsonReader
    Converts database from json to hashtable collection.
    JsonWriter
    Converts collection from hashtable to json.
    Process
    Classes that implement this interface contain messages for output in insert mode, correction and check classes.
    ValueHandler
    Contains correction and checking of all values of the collection class.
    ValueTransformer
    Contains functions for converting each string value to Vehicle class values.
